prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Brass, Guitar, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Organ, Brass, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Brass, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, with no Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is present in this song, which includes Organ, Brass, Guitar, Drums, and Bass.
